description: A moderate 4 km trail (8 return ) that leads through coastal old growth forest past a series of small lakes to Robinson Lake. A small rustic picnic area is located along the lakeshore. Expect a return trip to take 5-7 hours.
directions: From the Kitimat Chamber of Commerce building on Highway 37, head east along Forestry Avenue and the South Hirsch Forest Service road for about 1.9 km. Turn right on the Wathl Mainline and head south for about 3.5 km to the trailhead. Parking is available just past the trailhead sign on the left side of the road.
title: Robinson Lake Trail
